H3.text: who won the world cup in cricket 2017. Pakistan

A4.text: Pakistan won the one-sided final by 180 runs, winning their first Champions Trophy.

A5.text: India beat Bangladesh in the second semi-final, also winning comfortably by 9 wickets.
